con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="urn:claro_services_cc_ws" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" name="altaServicioResponse"> <part name="response" type="xsd:Array"/> </message> <portType name="claro_services_cc_wsPortType"> <operation name="consultaServicios">
